objects.text:
• 9 Hours Cooling Retention
• Sapphire Blue Premium Finish
• 184 Liters Capacity
• Energy Efficient Design

product_details.name: Whirlpool 184 L 2 Star Direct-Cool Single Door Refrigerator (205 WDE CLS 2S SAPPHIRE BLUE-Z, Blue,2023 Model)
product_details.description: Brand: Whirlpool. Model: 205 WDE CLS 2S. Capacity: 184 litres. Annual Energy Consumption: 190 Kilowatt Hours Per Year. Refrigerator Fresh Food Capacity: 169.2 litres. Freezer Capacity: 14.3 Litres. Bottle Count: 4. Installation Type: Freestanding. Part Number: 205 WDE CLS 2S. Form Factor: Stand Alone. Special Features: Adjustable Shelves. Colour: SAPPHIRE BLUE-Z. Voltage: 220. Wattage: 205 Watts. Number of Drawers: 4. Defrost System: Automatic. Door Orientation: Left. Door Material: Stainless Steel. Shelf Type: Wire. Number of Shelves: 2. Certification: Energy Rating. Material: Stainless Steel. Batteries Required: No. Country of Origin: India. Importer: Whirlpool of India Ltd. Plot No. A-4, MIDC Ranjangaon,Taluka Shirur, Dist: Pune, Maharashtra 412220, India, Email - helpdeskindia@whirlpool.com ; Toll Free - 1800 208 1800. Item Weight: 33 kg 400 g. Item Dimensions Lx Wx H: 60.5 x 53.5 x 118.8 Centimeters. Net Quantity: 1 count. Generic Name: Refrigerator.

banner_details:
The banner features an eye-catching promotional layout with a gradient blue and white background and a double-lined border enhanced by subtle geometric and wave design elements. The top section includes a bold uppercase heading (`tagline`) announcing a limited time offer. Just below, a larger, bold serif font highlights the featured product (`heading`). A horizontal accent line (`decorative`) separates the heading from the bullet-pointed list of features (`description`), which outlines benefits of the product. Prominently displayed is the price (`price`) in a large, bold font. It also includes urgency text elements such as a red promo call (`subheading`) and expiry warning (`offer_details`). A product visual (`product_image`) is prominently placed to the right, with a dark blue call-to-action button (`cta_background` + `cta`) near the bottom encouraging users to shop now.  

**Color Palette:**  
- Deep Navy (#1a2b63)  
- Royal Blue (#273c80)  
- Cool White (#ffffff)  
- Gradient Light Blue (#f5f9ff to #e0e8ff)  
- Accent Red (#e74c3c)
product_color: The product image showcases a deep, rich **midnight blue (#0E0E52)** as the primary color, creating a sleek and modern appearance. The edges subtly gradient into a **cool steel gray (#B3B9C4)**, producing a visual contour that enhances the depth of the image. Bold **white (#FFFFFF)** is used for text and icons, ensuring high contrast and clarity for key information like "9 HOURS COOLING RETENTION." The small energy label introduces **red (#C1272D)** and **green (#2E7D32)** highlights but remains visually minimal. Together, this palette conveys reliability and freshness, ideal for an advertisement banner promoting efficiency and modern design.
